name: You Can Do!mino
description:
this Is Singleplaygame.

It Is A Kind Of Puzzle and 3d Simulation Game.

Move Your character called DominoCreator and create dominos to solve puzzle.
You can enjoy different types of stay need to solve puzzle.



There is a board game called Dominoes. We already know that.
However, this game have added some new features that cannot exist in reality.
Clear the stage using dominoes with special functions.



Simple sandbox support. Build your own domino world.

there is many way to clear stage.
Find special method to success and share that at community.

[Caution] Using "Undo" make different results every trying.
Although same arrangement,somtimes it need to try many times to clear.
